scripts for deleting rpws that have been corupted from retete and reteteIngrediente


DELETE
  FROM [licenta3].[dbo].[Reteta]
  WHERE Idin ('C62249C0-1814-46AE-A0AC-23BB884895BE','1E0587D8-794E-4FA7-A25C-C730277739FA','48B52BCC-484E-4854-BA88-E55A69F4E0E0',
  '69501387-2B15-4EF6-9647-DE166DA71372','46969DAC-D9FA-4512-9CAA-77C519F9F7B1',
  '430E6569-E9FF-429D-86D1-0987DBBBBFBD','C49F6EF3-6BE3-4ADE-A083-1E79F90C8F67','B3750B4E-4DC3-4C17-B528-9232031A8BD8',
  '4D046246-7847-460D-9777-2291BF82C7EC','C0CD5BD3-73F5-4420-872E-81E14DDA5D50','D04E762F-34C3-4452-8381-25665A0A4BB7',
  '30748095-AA62-4D13-8FC8-52CF6DE1BBAA','52903FA6-7392-40FE-B178-C051EB9C5C35')


DELETE
  FROM [licenta3].[dbo].[Reteta]
  WHERE Id in ('0DACC8BA-64A5-4AFD-B9E4-080580058257','7CB7304B-0659-421D-897C-F91516CB828E',
  'DAA07441-2C8A-4965-AF1A-E08FB56B61A6','1E110B8E-D06A-4BAA-A50C-322E15989617','DA24795B-7849-40EA-A1F1-C2DDE23C9517',
  'C62249C0-1814-46AE-A0AC-23BB884895BE','9A1FB602-6516-451C-AE1F-1F455CFB0F47','15C59B82-409C-48F9-9639-891DCB633C56',
  '0A8A656D-4BA4-41DB-8EE3-3C4D4D1258A7','4E816D2E-88D5-4658-8EFD-BA5F1512FA03','D28744D0-CDD5-4A25-9124-40CB37F45F91',
  '357BEF3F-BB29-4F91-9F79-85924FEC4611','3F919B44-1FCE-4C72-B858-44DF797D0B15','6A8A8BA6-5655-4FB9-B1D9-57C4E8F6A505',
  'B8E90215-2425-4863-B754-C06130834B16')

/****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS  ******/
DELETE
  FROM [licenta3].[dbo].[Reteta]
  WHERE Id in ('F611BA32-E833-4FC3-AA68-189687109DEC','946DD152-C8B2-441F-82B2-F4CD1B691A1C','51424751-C1DD-41B5-A28F-E729C939E384',
  '9D5E1F93-BB06-4189-BEFF-AD75E716ACAC','E734E513-0EEB-4CC2-B1B4-B65DF42B6F86','046DA042-2B43-45A3-B6D9-FCE670EB659E',
  'C0FCA2E0-9BCA-4BAA-BC78-42FE45594AE5','70C1E463-283D-4DA4-A099-EA070DCDF793','EDB9541C-3E5B-487F-B140-9BBE0CC7D29C','2AD5345B-38F8-4E2D-8E46-F0BEFA2D0530',
  '36BB4F69-3966-4BD9-95F9-8024ED6B0761','5286E1DE-209B-4CDB-B368-B1426BD36363','50B8B75E-DE5E-4529-93B7-C46CDB78CA17','999BBAA4-1CA3-4A65-B58F-707369BC3663'
  ,'512561E2-B230-4C09-B136-AD7EB1371761','EA1C6BD6-968A-4D4E-A150-AC754AAF6A70','F8377D33-1D3D-4FE6-A6D7-9AA89222576F','109210DB-84DD-4BB2-9D94-2CFA3419DB30',
  'B109D749-6A1D-49AA-8836-C28026C88576','A6756843-3BB5-4555-9579-86F71B192FDB','8EFB50CB-0CAA-4EAD-8A45-424EFA0212B4','F42D4D8D-4DC4-49EC-87AE-4B6F59572A6D','99017DDA-6D23-46D2-9678-6791046AA19B')
